definition: hiss/neigh/Ss! (sound of air sucked between the teeth, indicating hesitation or thinking over)
to roar/to howl/to shriek/roar or howl of an animal/bellow of rage

sentences.english: And the roar of the deepest heart.
sentences.chinese: 和內心深處最深沉的嘶吼。

sentences.english: The ball of fire stayed in that one place as it burned and made a loud roar.
sentences.chinese: 火球覆蓋了那片區域，暗影燃燒着，嘶吼着。

sentences.english: From the deep inside HSS roared.
They stood and watched as she screamed.
sentences.chinese: 當她尖叫嘶吼的時候，他們就站在那裏看着。

sentences.english: The horse bellowed and started to run wildly.
sentences.chinese: 這隻馬嘶吼之後就開始狂奔。

sentences.english: And the little bears growl to each other, "He's mine".
sentences.chinese: 那些熊互相嘶吼“他將是我的。

definition: to roar/to thunder/to snarl/to bluster (of wind, waves etc)/crashing waves (onom.)/to rage (of a person)
to whinny (of a horse)/to neigh/to shout
to roar/to howl/to shriek/roar or howl of an animal/bellow of rage
(of animals, the wind etc) to make a mournful sound/whine/moan/wail
